title: Brand new | Fully Furnished | House for sale @ Ambuldeniya Nugegoda
details:
Brand new | Fully Furnished | House for sale @ Ambuldeniya Nugegoda

• - 10 Perches (2900 sq,ft)
• - The house comes fully furnished
• - Completely tiled flooring
• - 4 Bedroom (A/C) with 4 Baths (3 Attached)
• - All Bath and Pantry areas are supplied with Solar hot water
• - Beautiful Living, Dinning, Bar with pantry area
• - Upstair TV lobby open to rear balocony
• - Open veranda / Medium size garden area
• - Seperate servant facilities (room, toilet & bath)'
• - 3 phase electricity / French windows / colourful lights
• - KDK ceiling fans / Fully curtained / Finishing roof
• - Pipe born water with overhead water tank
• - Car porch plus parking space for another 4 vehicles
• - Right round well built walls with 2 sliding gates(1 with remote)

• - Walking distance to Ambuldeniya City Limit(300m)
• - Nearest Cities - Nugegoda /Mirihana/ Madiwela/ Maharagama

37 million , 370 Laks (Negotiable)
